review: It's a great little device. It has several fun games and several online video streaming apps. If you have prime membership it includes prime video and music and many fun things. We don't watch TV much anymore, other than for GOT now.  The only things I'm unhappy with is this clicking noise it makes once in a while, but you have to really pay attention to be able to hear it. My family can't hear it until I point it out. Also, maybe it's my internet connection, but it stalls sometimes, very few times, but enough to bother me. Best thing about it is whenever we have family night at my in laws house, I can take the little device with me for movies and such.Great buy!

review: I love my kindle fire stick, I previously had a roku 3 and while the roku had a lot of similar apps this seems to function much better.
